settings.text: More Scintific and Safer Speed Range

settings.content:
• Compact Size &Mini Stereo: Our compact foldable treadmill features a high-power 3HP motor and a shock-absorbing running belt made of PVC, fiber, and cotton yarn. This combination provides a quiet and stable workout experience. With a speed range of 1-6kmh, it's suitable for all fitness levels. The LED display shows important data such as speed, time, distance, and calories burned, and with Bluetooth connectivity, you can stream your favorite music to keep you motivated and energized.
  • 2-In-1 Foldable Treadmill: Our treadmill is designed to accommodate most users, with a spacious run area measuring 47" x 20.8". Its powerful 3 HP motor can support up to 220 lbs, and the handrail can be raised to transform it into a jogging and running treadmill. Alternatively, fold the handrail up and use it as an under-desk treadmill, allowing you to exercise while you work or watch TV. Its compact and foldable design makes it easy to store in small spaces.
  • LED Display & Remote Control & App: Our under-desk treadmill has a LED display that shows important workout data such as time, calories , speed, and mileage, making it easy to track your progress. It also has a device holder for your phone or tablet, allowing you to enjoy entertainment while exercising. Not only can use remote control to adjust mode but also can use the "FitShow" App by phone to control it.

• Space Saving: The walking pad treadmill under desk is designed with our best technology, making it both sturdy and slim. Its compact size allows it to be used in small spaces, and the handrail can be easily folded and stored away. With front wheels, it's easy to move around, and its ultra-thin design saves valuable space.
  • Non-assembly Design: The 2 in 1 treadmill arrives fully assembled, ready to use right out of the box. Its foldable design and transportation wheels make it easy to move and store, perfect for home, apartment, or office use. Simply fold it up and walk away in one easy step, allowing for easy mobility and storage.
  • 7-Layer Anti-Slip Design: Our desk treadmill for office under desk is designed to offer a safe and secure workout experience. Featuring a 7-layer anti-slip running belt and double protection mechanism, you can exercise without worrying about fire hazards.

settings.title: Pets can Exercise on the Treadmill
settings.content: Walking is not only beneficial to human health, but also keeps pets happy.The treadmill for home allows your pet to walk freely at home without fear of rain, snow or thunderstorms.

settings.title: Save Storage Space
settings.content: The simple design gives you more storage space. It is small and can be stored under tables and sofas.

settings.title: Support Up to 265LBS
settings.content: With the maximum load capacity of 265LBS, the treadmill is stable and comfortable to use.

settings.text: Welcome to a better way to work

settings.content: We help you furnish an inspiring, supportive workspace without breaking the bank. Here's how:

settings.content: Designed to support you throughout the day, optimizing comfort and productivity

settings.title: EASY ASSEMBLY

settings.title: High-quality materials
